subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Carlos Delgado drove in the tying run in the eighth and David Wright’s bases-loaded double in the ninth propelled the Mets to a victory in the finale of their seven-game trip.
snippet: Carlos Delgado drove in the tying run in the eighth and David Wright’s bases-loaded double in the ninth propelled the Mets to a victory in the finale of their seven-game trip.
